roleset.name: strike with cane
roleset.note: CANE-V NOTES: Hand-corrected by Claire. (from cane.01-v)

example.name: All arguments
example.text: In that case this man has some serious questions to answer as to [why]-1 he caned a six year old child when it was illegal to do so *-1.
example.arg: when it was illegal to do so

example.name: With cause, passive
example.text: [They]-1 were caned *-1 for whispering, for talking, for singing.
example.arg: for whispering, for talking, for singing.
